TextBlock.Text: [56/7432] HOME SYSTEM: Lens array delivered. Make good use of this, we are low on resources and political goodwill.
[89/7432] INSTALLATION: The weapon has been completed, awaiting your orders Home System.
[89/7432] HOME SYSTEM: Hang tight Installation, we're in a difficult spot right now.
[99/7432] INSTALLATION: What's the situation Home System, we haven't heard from you in a while?
[100/7432] INSTALLATION: Home System, what's the situation?
